DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect interdisciplinary group base patient education patient low back pain . The patient recruit four group base patient education lesson two month period . The study randomize control trial patient randomized standard treatment standard treatment patient education . The patient education lead physiotherapist , nurse physician . The outcomes function , pain , quality life , self-efficacy , depression . The data report questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Patient Education Functions Patients With Non-specific and/or Degenerative Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized controlled trial ; intervention study . Patients : Patients low back pain ; refer Nordsjaellands Hospital , Denmark . Inclusion criterion : adult , low back pain minimum score 4 numeric rating scale , able conduct exercise training . Exclusion criterion : unable understand Danish , psychiatric disorder , dementia , approach operation , current approach settlement regard work ability compensation result low back pain . Intervention : Randomization usual care usual care four time two hour group base patient education interdisciplinary focus self-management low back pain . The patient education deliver physiotherapist , nurse physician . Outcome : function , pain , quality life , self-efficacy , depression . The data report questionnaire . Sample size : 74 participant .
DOC.criteria: adult low back pain minimum score 4 numeric rating scale able conduct exercise training unable understand Danish psychiatric disorder dementia approach operation current approach settlement regard work ability compensation result low back pain
